ModMetaData.name: [test] Lightsabers + CE compatibility patch (b18)
ModMetaData.author: rwtesting
ModMetaData.description:
Combat Extended compatibility patch for Star Wars - Lightsabers (b18).
Small patch to give lightsabers the necessary CE values to remove errors generated when trying to use the Lightsabers mod with Combat Extended in b18.
CE values were taken from the vibroaxe in the CE b18 Star Wars Factions patch (bulk, armor penetration, crit, parry, weapon tags).
Load order: - Combat Extended - Star Wars - Lightsabers - This patch
